Geographic Boundaries.Source: Healthy Regions & Policies Lab, UIUC; Tiger/Line 2018; Tiger/Line 2010

Household Characteristics.Variable Proxy: Total Population in Households, % Nonrelatives in Family Households, % Nonrelatives in Non-family Households, % Males 15 years and over who are divorced, Average family size, etc.

% Female householder with no spouse/partner living alone

Variables: % Population identifying as two or more races
% Population with ethnicity identified as of Hispanic or Latinx origin
